lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Americans are the most generous people in the world.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I think these micro loans are a great way to help people around the world. When I was in the Marines I traveled to many places and saw first hand how difficult it was for hard working people to get ahead. It makes me feel great that I can play a small part in helping them. People helping people, there should be more of this in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am married and have 4 kids. The two oldest are in collage. I got my U.S. Power Plant and Airframe license out of a trade school in Pittsburgh Pennsylvania. I have been working for Delta Air Lines for 21 years. Aircraft are such engineering marvels and fascinating to work on. I learn something new every day. I really enjoy my job.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources to HELP.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a geography and Urban Planning Student.  I plan on graduating with a Master's Degree.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I am a young entrepenuer and female I truly know how hard it is to have a dream and not the finicial support you need.
lenders.occupational_info: exciting and interesting.

lenders.name: Samuel Uriah
lenders.loan_because: It's my first birthday and I got a kiva loan as a gift.  This could start a lifelong habit :)
lenders.occupational_info: I play, I eat, I sleep, I eat, I play...

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: My students and I want to help others to better themselves. Everyone deserves a little help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adults who are working on making a better life for themselves as you are.

lenders.name: Joseph & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: A way to touch someone all around the word!
lenders.occupational_info: Security Officer and Telecommucations

lenders.name: Mayou Darius
lenders.loan_because: What seems so little to us can make a huge difference to other people in the world. It feels great to be able to help others.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the need in other countries and know how much these loans can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I research medical data to help Medicaid programs which help those who do not have insurance for their medical needs.

lenders.name: Jeff Hoard
lenders.loan_because: The internet has provided me with many opportunities in my life, I would like to use the internet to help less fortunate people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from home, on a computer, looking for videos that I think people should watch.

lenders.name: Sassan
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people in need of help

lenders.name: Loretta & Reg
lenders.loan_because: we are lucky enough to be able to

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: It keeps me connected to other places and people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach foster parents who take care of abused children.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I'm happy to do my small part in helping people who just hope for a helping hand - not a handout - to provide for themselves and their families.  Many of these hardworking people improve the lives of their communities through their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a stock broker who invests for individuals trying to save for their future and/or their retirement.

lenders.name: Kris
lenders.loan_because:
I saw a TV program about helping third world poverty, so here I am.

I didn't have much money when I was in my 20's so this is my way of helping those less fortunate than me, now that i am more financially secure..
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain natural gas pipelines in Australia. I've been doing it for over 25 years.

lenders.name: Mickey & Tetyana
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something where I feel like I am making a difference in someone's life.  I was very fortunate to be born in a wealthy country.  I just want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who make the internet work for my company.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I love my work; I would not take so much as a penny for doing it if it wern't for the unfortunate necessity of money_     So, if one can afford to ease the burden of another's somewhat wanting cash flow, one ought to_     One cannot take it with oneself when one goes_
lenders.occupational_info: I sew from scratch, or alter from existing garments, costumes for theatrical productions. When the costumes are made and the production goes into dress rehearsals, I often aid in the running of the show from the wardrobe end of things; which entails: helping peformers change costumes when they haven't time between scenes to accomplish the transformation on their own, mending the wear and tear, and seeing to the washing of the costumes_    When I'm not stitching, I often work as a carpenter or scenic painter creating the sets for the productions_    I sometimes even work as an electrician to put up the lighting for the shows.

lenders.name: Sachin
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a group to create software programs for engineers.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.occupational_info: I help schools, nonprofits, and other organizations with database and server administration.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to believe that my actions can impact the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am graduating from the University of Kansas with a major in political science and international studies. I am starting law school at the University of Missouri-Kansas City in the Fall.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a very worthwhile use of my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other teachers to use computers and other technology to enhance student learning.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people

lenders.name: Babush
lenders.loan_because: "Empty pockets never held anyone back.  Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that."  ~Norman Vincent Peale

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to get a better life.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give others the opportunities that I have enjoyed.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach/ taught civics, innovation, technology and history at the upper secondary school level.

lenders.name: Karl Iver
lenders.loan_because: Supporting private businees is the best way to secure development
lenders.occupational_info: Helping fish farmers grow fish in an ecological efficient manner

lenders.name: Silvia & Daniele
lenders.loan_because:
Silvia loans because I asked her to do this thing together. I loan because I like this new way of helping others.

Daniele

lenders.name: Leandros
lenders.occupational_info: I am a junior high school student and I plan to take Economics as a major at college. Currently, I am taking intensive courses of Economics at school in the IB program. Also, I have taken Global Economics at Exeter's Summer session 2006 where I studied several topics, two of them being Microcredit and Microlending which really influnced me. I am in the process of writing a big paper for school on collusive oligopoly and I have done a paper on pollution and tradable permits.

lenders.name: Bjarne
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a different way to help people to help them self.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a Director in a larger company and my territory is the Nordic (Denmark, Sweden, Finland & Norway).

lenders.name: olivier
lenders.loan_because: people in the poor part of the world have the same right than me to have something.
lenders.occupational_info: I work behind a desk, doing administrative work

lenders.name: 3B-EDITIONS
lenders.loan_because: Lorsque chacun d'entre nous se sentira personnellement concerné par une personne plus en difficulté dans le monde, la misère sera définitivement éradiquée de la planète !

lenders.name: Mr. M's 7th Grade Class
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a perfect example of compassionate capitalism, and I'd much rather see some of my savings helping others than just sitting in a financial institution.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a former advertising copywriter who now writes about my own interests, and one of those interests is maintaining a blog

lenders.name: Gale
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are willing to work hard to better their lives and those of their families.

lenders.name: Spence
lenders.loan_because: It feels right.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm self employed and deliver documents and packages throught-out Houston, Texas.

lenders.name: Lise and Morten
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me happy. 
I can and therefore I should

lenders.name: Anne and Joel
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in need, and we think that microfinance is an effective way to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: Anne is a retired academic reference librarian who helped college students find information on topics they were studying, and Joel is a retired research scientist who is still studying DNA replication at a cancer research institute.

lenders.name: Lotte
lenders.loan_because: If you help a man, you help a man. If you help a woman, you help her entire family. I loan because Kiva is a way for me to help women trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: Morgan
lenders.loan_because: There are too many people in the developing parts of the world that are just as talented as us in the western world; they just lack opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that writes database software.  I provide help by answering questions about our software to our customers (which are usually also software companies).

lenders.name: josh
lenders.loan_because: I think if we all gave more the world would be a better place. I have been very lucky to have the things I have and can give my boys. I wish everyone could be so lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I build custom homes for people who have more than most could even dream of.

lenders.name: A and J
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful program that honestly wants to help people.
lenders.occupational_info:
A:  Helps Disabled young adults find employment.
J:  helps injured workers receive benefits.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to do something like this. Now ive found a portal that lets me do it.
lenders.occupational_info: eBay

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country in which I have opportunity and a good standard of living.  I feel strongly that we can have an impact on others in our communities and across the world if we work hard to become more aware of the challenges that others face and the ways in which we can help people in need, both here and abroad.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of English Literature, and I also work in public relations.

lenders.name: Jansler
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others having a chance of fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an educational company, within the area of IT and personal development.

lenders.name: Ienni Family
lenders.loan_because: We love people and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Inhale, exhale, bless and love everyone and everything.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microcredit can change the world
lenders.occupational_info: wealth management.  prior to this occupation I spent 18 years lending money in the U.S.

lenders.name: The Sample Family
lenders.loan_because: To educate our family on geography, business and most importantly giving.

lenders.name: Laura  A.
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's lives.....I  care about helping other people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large medical office supervising the work of younger women - hopefully helping them become the best that they can be at what they do.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I fix and build computers for other people as well as large companies.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way of fighting poverty.

lenders.name: Jorgen Madsen
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people  to raise their standarts of living.
I like the idea of microloans.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a company producing
hearing-aids.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: One can't decide where and when they are born, or how much money their family has - I got lucky, and I hope to help give others some of the opportunities that I've had.

lenders.name: Kaya
lenders.loan_because: I am the second child of a wealthy family in a wealthy country.  My older brother, Loris, is 4 years old.  He really loves me.  My godfather decided to lend money in my name in order to provide business people in other countries with working capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 16 months old child.  There is not really any work I do at the moment.  My godfather is doing something in finance.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: To help others make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people understand what's happening in their lives from a spiritual stand point and empowering them to work through the situations in their life.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I am going through very tough times right now, both financially as well as mentally.  I have friends to lean on when needed.  I know they are thinking of me and looking for ways to help make this time in my life a little easier.  I want to feel like I am helping someone and making their struggle, just a little bit easier too.
lenders.occupational_info: I design reports that extract data from various databases.  These reports support all departments from accounting to the warehouse.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy loaning money to help hard working people improve their lives.

lenders.name: Y-SMRUC
lenders.loan_because: Our youth group did a fundraiser at our church and we want to use the money to help people develop their businesses around the world - mostly in Africa because we learned a lot about Africa.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: The same reason you do, I guess...

lenders.name: Maria and Jay
lenders.loan_because:
We would like to bring our new child into a world that supports one another. (April 07)

Feb 09 update: We are now expecting our 2nd child in a few weeks.  We are so glad to continue to support Kiva as we welcome a new spirit into this shared world!
lenders.occupational_info: Maria is a naturopathic doctor and Jay works at a natural foods store.  We are trying to help others live in their own best health and reach their full potential!

lenders.name: Geena
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to help and do my best to do so. I am glad that there are organizations that help the people in need.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I have a strong belief in helping those who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with client employers to improve their approach and practices working with employees.

lenders.name: M Ram
lenders.loan_because: I come from a country (India) where I have seen people struggling with basic requirements. I can understand very well how small amounts, like cost of a coffee in the developed world, can make a huge difference in the life of a family in the developing world. Kiva helps me fulfil my deepest feelings of helping the most needy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a project manager in a semi conductor company building broadband communications. In simple terms, my company's products power the internet, TVs, internet phones, and the like.

lenders.name: nico
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people making their own money as an entrepreneur. I will support them.
lenders.occupational_info: consultancy (local) government

lenders.name: Gunvor Munch
lenders.loan_because: I think helping people to help themselves is the best way to preserve peoples self-respect and dignity
lenders.occupational_info: I teach nursing students anatomy and physiology, biochemistry, genetics, different religions and how to meet people from other cultures.

lenders.name: Marechal Family
lenders.occupation: IT Director inside a French Tour Operator
lenders.loan_because:
Be the change that you want to see in the world. (Gandhi) 
and it's better to do something ....

lenders.name: joy
lenders.loan_because: such a small amount can make a big difference.  plus Kiva keeps you connected with the progress of how your loans impact real people

lenders.name: John & Silvana
lenders.loan_because: it's great to help someone develop a business on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: John teaches high school in America and also helps to organize and develop career education opportunities for students. Silvana (originally from Australia) teaches Kinder and 1st grade.

lenders.name: claira
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea and a wonderful way to empower people to help themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to raise issue about their national health service treatment in the UK.

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I realize there are people who have more of a need for it than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant.  I bring food out to people, I clean up tables, and I try to make the restaurant an enjoyable place to be.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I'd want someone to loan to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell important and interesting true stories so people can know more about the communities they are part of. And I empower others to express themselves through movement.

lenders.name: Dennis & Vannessa
lenders.loan_because: others have helped us become more successful, and we want to do the same for other people.
lenders.occupational_info: We design computer chips

lenders.name: Alexa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Nonprofit marketing firm: Loken Creative

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: Why not? Do you?

lenders.name: Matthew Cichocki
lenders.occupational_info: Robert Wood Johnson Medical School

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: This is a powerful yet inexpensive way to help many people better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I've been unemployed since Oct '09, looking for work as a project/program manager for a company full-time managing prereleased software programs with customers. I'm also a part-time freelance graphic designer.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It feels good

lenders.name: The Happy Minimalist
lenders.loan_because: I want to get a virtuous cycle going

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is a wonderful idea, I love that a lot of people plus a small amount of money can make such a big difference to people.
lenders.occupational_info: Photograph editor

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending with personal attention to each participant is effective. I enjoy seeing hard working entreprens reach their goals for the benefit of their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Constructing Power Plants worldwide. Has previously provided state development assistance and finance to small businesses.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Kiva seems like a great way to create opportunity because it allows people to use the money in the way that they know will be the most useful to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach and manage afterschool programs for teenagers. In my class students learn to make music using computers and how to do sounds for movies. Students get to use their creativity and also gain computer skills.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I feel this program requires tremendous initiative and drive on the part of these people; I admire that. It is a system which keeps providing for many years to come.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an college professor who teaches courses in communication. Like you, I constantly try to further myself through courageous endeavors. Good luck and god bless in all that you strive to accomplish!!

lenders.name: bobby
lenders.loan_because: i want to inlarge my petty trade
lenders.occupational_info: is trading with clothing

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Just wanted to help.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consist of responding to help all people whom may have an emergecy such as fires, floods, medical, and just about any unforeseen accident.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed.  Sharing and encouraging people around the world to achieve their dreams is so satisfying.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a judge, making decisions about domestic violence, crimes, and traffic tickets, the stuff of average people who make occasional mistakes.

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 8th grade middle school student in massachusetts.

lenders.name: Mickey
lenders.loan_because: My parents were nice enough to open account for my 25th Birthday!

lenders.name: Janet & Bill
lenders.loan_because: My husband Bill and I lend because we have seen examples of how well micro-loans work in other parts of the world. The idea of Americans helping developing nations achieve success instead of bullying them or bombing them seems like the right idea to us. Micro-loans look like the perfect way to start and they are something everyone, no matter their economic status, can help with.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Credit Manager. My husband Bill has his own graphic design business.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It's right to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide medical care to people who have mental health problems.

lenders.name: James and Dayna
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I have been blessed with much love and material comforts and believe sharing such blessings is a duty and previledge.  While we donate to various organizations, Kiva provides a much more personal venue for assisting others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a project manager for an environmental consulting firm which principally represents large industrial clients that require the assistance of outside consultants to comply with governmental regulations to protect the environment.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: If we want to break the cycle of poverty, the best way to do so is to draw in capital and investment.  I'm a firm believer in capitalism!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a school teacher.

lenders.name: Geralin
lenders.loan_because: We are one family and families help each other always.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my students to realize that they can decide to be loving and moral people who make a difference in this world.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and that starts as simple as people helping people. We loan as a family because we want to show our children that the world is bigger than just us and people need each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a large research hospital.  I take care of sick people that have not been cured by convential treatment.  For many of my patient, the experimental treatment we provide are their last hope of a cure.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: Even though I can't work anymore, supporting Kiva's efforts is something I can do that makes me feel VERY connected to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to set up programs to try to help protect the environment.  I'm so glad to have found Kiva so that my loans can keep being reinvested to help some really special people..

lenders.name: Curt
lenders.loan_because: it makes me :-)

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.occupation: art teacher in an elementary school

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva is an easy way to make a significant impact for someone in a personal way.  
I also use Kiva to explain to my children how different others live throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with private and public drinking water systems and work with well drillers.

lenders.name: Bavouzet
lenders.loan_because:
We are placed on the earth to be the caretakers of all that is here. Each generation has a responsibility to ensure the survival of our seventh generation.
With microloans we can take small collective steps along with the kindness of others, and make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I love to photograph and document the world I experience so that I may share it with my social studies students. There are two quotes  that speak greatly of my beliefs.
 
1) Margaret Mead said: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has."   

2) The Lakota have a wonderful saying. Mitakuye Oyasin. We are all One People!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful opportunity for me, at no great cost to myself, to help someone who really needs it.  It makes me feel very happy.  I love this program!

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have all of my needs met.  I want to help others have the ability to do that for themselves and their families.  I believe that we need to treat each other with love and kindness and this is one way that I can do that.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should have an opportunity to succeed. Though I am a only a college student and do not make very much money, I believe in sharing what I have with those less fortunate than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I diagnose and repair computer problems, among other things.

lenders.name: Shahnnen
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much, it's only right to give back.  I've lived in Africa and traveled, and have seen the sadness of poverty coupled with the sheer happiness of their dispositions.

lenders.name: Provenio Software
lenders.loan_because: We're a small business and we support small businesses and entrepreneurs everywhere.
lenders.occupational_info: We make a computer software product called Say the Time®, which is a fun personal time management utility.

lenders.name: Hattie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that even a small contribution by an individual can make a big difference in the lives of many.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of helping someone help themselves...I've been lucky enough to receive help when needed, so now it's my turn...
lenders.occupational_info: My wife Tara & I have been playing in a rock band for the past 13 years...Tara sings & plays bass, and I play the drums...while it's very mentally/creatively rewarding, it is not financially, so I work at an ad agency during the day...

lenders.name: Laura & John
lenders.loan_because: this is the only useful thing we do on the internet.

lenders.name: Jason & Stevie
lenders.loan_because: We don't agree with lenders making profits when there are private individuals who are willing to take on the risk to help a fellow entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: Jason designs and programs websites. Stevie works in the library at a local University.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to help in this small way!  I am especially interested in giving back to women in the Dominican Republic, after being the recipeint of so much hospitality while living there for 2 years as a Peace Corps member.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: "A hundred times every day I remind myself that my inner and outer life depends on the labors of other men, living and dead, and that I must exert myself in order to give in the measure as I have received and am still receiving." - Albert Einstein

lenders.name: Hibbary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw and paint.   Constantly.  ha ha

lenders.name: Sakthi
lenders.loan_because: it gives these entrepreneurs the opportunity they deserve

lenders.name: Lene
lenders.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I make a loan

lenders.name: Kip
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to make a tangible difference in someone's life.  We need to help out wherever we can and as often as we can to those less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people, process and technology to make life better for my company.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make things better
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories for children

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I feel that investing in a person in another country demonstrates a trust and connection far beyond making a simple donation.  A small amount of my pay each month can help several businesses succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design robots that are sent to Mars.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about women's economic, social and political empowerment and I want to contribute to helping achieve sustainability of women in the developing world, and especially in Africa.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a young lawyer and I work in aircraft finance, which means that I work on contracts that arrange lending of money to aircraft operators, like airlines,  to buy the aircraft or to lease aircraft. However my first job as a lawyer was in Botswana, Africa and that is where my passion for Africa and women's empowerment began.

lenders.name: Claus Kjær
lenders.loan_because: Microcredits is a great way to give poor, but creative and entreprenurial people a helping hand!

lenders.name: Mikael Toxværd
lenders.loan_because: Hope that it will give someone longterm help.

lenders.name: April & Gabe
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, I wish I could do more.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people accomplish their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people around the world who are working hard to build a business and support their families and communities.

lenders.name: Alaina
lenders.loan_because: To quote Mahatma Ghandi: Start by being the change you want for the world. I like that because a lot of people talk about transformation of all kinds but really it has to start from oneself.  If we all lived the change that we want for the world, we'd see amazing results.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites and create wallpaper murals, brochures and other print materials for individuals and companies.  I'm also an energy healer.  I used to work in the hotel/restaurant industry and also in public libraries.

lenders.name: Fifi
lenders.loan_because:
I am able to help, and it feels good to assist even if it is in a small way. 
"You must be the change you wish to see in the world" Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: kananko
lenders.loan_because: I want people in developing countries to begin any business for development of their abilities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, studying politics.

lenders.name: alana
lenders.loan_because: i live in a country where i am paid a pension because i am disabled. i have very little money but i want to share it with those who need a lend.
lenders.occupational_info: i don't work. my body doesn't work properly.

lenders.name: Indra
lenders.loan_because: It is good to see the direct results of simply lending to assist in providing a practical need. lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Gideon
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending has not only proven to be one of the most effective ways of working toward an egalitarian world economy, but it is a way that individuals can truly affect change. It is a basic human right to have access to credit.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: i enjoy the giving of money

lenders.occupational_info: I work at the central bank of the United States (the Federal Reserve) as an economics researcher.  In a nutshell, I use statistics and economic models to stuy how macroeconomies fluctuate (prices, employment, production, etc).

lenders.name: Robert

lenders.loan_because: Microfinance works

lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone the chance to make a better life for themselves and to help them become a productive and economic benefit within their community. Unity and equality through the organic growth of economics. When we help others, we help ourselves. It's a worthwhile investment.

lenders.loan_because: I have received so much during my short lifetime.

lenders.occupational_info: I help the banking system work.

1. The difference between offering a helping hand and a handout.
2. That the more positive contacts they make with the rest of the world the better their future will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to and support women, men and young people who are having a difficult time  solving problems in their life, e.g. resolving family or work related conflicts, or helping them to overcome their fear of changing a way of thinking or behaviour.

lenders.loan_because: I know how much it means to get the money you really need.

lenders.loan_because: I have seen the man who has not any legs to stand...and I stare down at my shoes.

lenders.loan_because: I'd just lose in the stock market otherwise

lenders.name: Teckie
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have more than enough and I want to be a blessing to others.

lenders.loan_because: my money is God's money and so it is only fair to share it....
lenders.occupational_info: I am here to spread the love of christ

lenders.name: Barger family
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea, that in some small way, I may be helping someone gain independence and improve their life.  Chase the dream....
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support to scientists developing novel approachs to the challenges facing the world today.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I spent the summer after my first year of law school working at the Forum for Women, Law, & Development in Kathmandu, Nepal. I was able to see firsthand the difficulties faced by people in developing countries. Microfinance loans are one of the most effective ways to improve someone's quality of life.

lenders.name: Jack & Kay
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to us and we wish to help make an  difference in this world.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel like I'm giving back.  I want to use my success as a means to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an academic research lab

lenders.name: Amos
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people who make the efforts and take the opportunities to better their lives and those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses and organizations make better use of their information and assets.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: even though the sun might be shining outside of my window...somewhere in the world the rain is coming down hard on someone else's "day".

lenders.name: Only4Him
lenders.loan_because: all good things come from the Lord. I am giving to others because it pleases Him!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fourth grade students. I also travel around the world telling others about God.

lenders.name: Helen and Matt
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help people in need.

lenders.name: Adams Family
lenders.loan_because: We love teaching our children how great it is to help others and to learn about different parts of the world!  By small and simple things, great things are brought to pass.

lenders.name: Ken & Art
lenders.loan_because:
May, 2007: Seems like a powerful idea to enable people to help themselves to build the lives they want.  We're definitely going to give this a try....

Update: September, 2007.  Lending funds to small businesspeople in developing countries has proven to be even more rewarding than we expected.  Each of the worthy borrowers has repaid a good share of the loans and all are successful enough to meet the monthly payment schedule.  We enjoy reading the reports of their success.  When the loans are fully repaid, we'll re-lend the funds to more hardworking small businesspeople around the world.

Update: October 2007.  More than half of the entrepreneurs in our portfolio have already repaid 50% or more of their small  starter loans.  We enjoy reading the updates on their businesses.

Update: January, 2008.  Our first loan to a woman in Nigeria has been fully repaid and we reloaned the money to a group of women in Pakistan.

Update: March 2008.  Well this experiment is really working well.  5 of our original loans have already been paid back in full and we've reloaned the funds to other businesswomen and also made some more loans with new funds.  

We love food and particularly love MEAT.  So lately, we've focused our lending portfolio on the women who make the world a better place through meat.  Check out the photos of knife-wielding ladies from Peru to Nigeria to Cambodia and beyond, purveyors of Beef, Pork, Guinea Pigs, Goats, and more.  We tip our hats to Kiva for the great meat and animal photos.  Kiva really is making the world a better place: capitalism and carinvorism, an idea we can really get behind.

May 2008:  We've been Kiva lenders for a year now and it has worked out great.  

September 2008:  We joined Kiva Community Team Vermont...Jeezum Crow!  Click here to Join:

http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=community&action=viewTeam&team_id=215

May 2009:  It's been two years and we've done 38 loans so far.  The experience has been great, and we can recommend Kiva to all our friends.  This is so much better than sending food because it helps people become self-sufficient.

July 2009:  Meat is good business around the world.  And we don't lend to commies.  Sorry Viet Nam, you're on your own.  42 loans so far.

September 2009:  47 loans so far. More lady butchers from Mongolia to Peru.

April 2010:  57th loan went to Gregoria in Bolivia.

October 2010:  69th loan went to Magdalena in Philippines to raise delicious pigs.

October 2011:  Up to 102 loans so far.  Meat & fish by women around the world.  
June 2013:  We've loaned $2,950 so far with Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Ken comes up with new ideas for businesses and Art is a full-time college student, majoring in Geology and minoring in Environmental Science.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
I started Lending to Kiva Entrepreneurs in 2007. It has been an amazing experience and I am grateful to be a part of it. 
Basically, you are lending as little as $25 and once the funds are repaid, you may either lend it to another needy person or group or just withdraw the funds.
To me it's a win win deal in help others less fortunate build a life for themselves and their families.
I am an entrepreneur who would like to give everyone the opportunity to make a living through entrepreneurship. 
Giving this opportunity to men and women who don't have the opportunities afforded to me is an honor and a privilege.
I salute them all and my goal is to lend to and help as many people in need as possible.
lenders.occupational_info:
By day I am an ultrasound technician, happy to tell mom's if they are having a boy or girl.
I am a wife and mom to 2 amazing daughters.
The rest of my time is spent as an entrepreneur building an online business.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I've travelled all over the world and seen how hard people work to support their families. I'm grateful to be in a position to help make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have come to the United States to find a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.occupational_info: Our business was to help others through training and development. We worked with individuals and businesses to help them improve and be more successful.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help those less fortunate than myself.

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from USAID and now work on healthcare reform and Middle East peace from my home in West Virginia.

This is how very small businesses can raise non-equity capital. 

They don't have time to market their financial needs to institutions, and financial institutions can't justify pro-active lending to very small businesses.

I live with my husband and 11 year old daughter in a house in New Hampshire where we raise chickens and geese where we enjoy the blessings of good health and the love of family and friends.

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
"Until one is committed, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back-- Concerning all acts of initiative (and creation), there is one elementary truth that ignorance of which kills countless ideas and splendid plans: that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would never otherwise have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in one's favor all manner of unforeseen incidents and meetings and material assistance, which no man could have dreamed would have come his way. Whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it. Begin it now."

W. H. Murray in The Scottish Himalaya Expedition, 1951/ Goethe
lenders.occupational_info: I work with others to find ways to improve the quality of healthcare.

...I [Almighty God] have chosen: 
to loose the chains of injustice and untie the cords of the yoke, 
to set the oppressed free and break every yoke...
to share your food with the hungry

Then your light will break forth like the dawn, 
and your healing will quickly appear... [Isaiah 58]

lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: The Wagners
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others financially and especially appreciate the "no middle man" aspect of KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach US History and Current Events to juniors and seniors in a middle class town in Maine.

lenders.name: Jourdan
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending UC Berkeley in the fall and hope to major in Developmental Studies and International Relations.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: i care
lenders.occupational_info: i go to school

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: those who have, should give.
lenders.occupational_info: i attend college at Southeastern Louisiana University and work for a non-profit organization called City at Peace.

lenders.name: Kenzi
lenders.loan_because: If I were starting a business, I would need help too. Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that a small amount to me can make a difference in someone else's life. It's important to help others if you're able to.
lenders.occupational_info: In-home dog training, behavioral counseling & boarding

lenders.name: Tek
lenders.loan_because: "Kiva" is a very efficient and direct means of developing promising enterprises around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Design, build and repair roads, highways, bridges, runways, drainage facilities etc.

lenders.name: Salman
lenders.loan_because: I want to use God's blessings on me to alleviate the suffering of those who are less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I design circuits.

lenders.name: huirub
lenders.loan_because: little bit little bit help lor

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it's simple and sensible -- and it's wonderful to know that an ordinary person like me CAN do something. I'm honoured to be in business with my partners around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Most of my work is children's literature. I never outgrew my love of children's stories.

lenders.name: Joanie
lenders.loan_because: it helps someone to have a better life. I have a good life and I have this privilege and opportunity to provide this loan.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Sheila from Scotland
lenders.loan_because:
I  have run my own business for 20 years and have great respect for those also willing to take that risk.  

This is a way of repaying those who helped me when I started.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people run their businesses more effectively.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: it is easy, satisfying and achieves something.
lenders.occupational_info: I make bad news seem good and good news seem better

lenders.name: Jemela
lenders.loan_because: Money is like blood it must be circulated to maintain good economic health.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a light -touch laying on of hands that releases tensions deep in the body to relieve pain and dysfunction and helps to improve health and performance for the whole body.

lenders.name: Keava Koo
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to proactively improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Self-employed technical project manager for large companies.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women who don't have the means or the opportunities readily available to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a newspaper group that is located in New York City.  My job is to manage advertisers who place their ads on our different websites.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I know what a difference micro-lending can make in people's lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I received a loan to start my own business. Once I had achieved my goals, I promptly paid this loan back.  If I had not received this loan, I would not be where I am today.
lenders.occupational_info: I program Oracle Databases for large corporations

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: we must be the change we wish to see in the world

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I support people creating their own business
lenders.occupational_info: I design and update webpages

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others.  My money can stretch a lot farther this way too, which is awesome!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with 9 and 10 year old boys and girls (about 20) in a classroom teaching everything from math and reading, science and history, to life and respecting each other.

lenders.name: Stan/Ellen
lenders.loan_because: A wonderful way to reach out to help people

lenders.name: Mayou Darius
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference. By helping the parents, we can help their kids to get a better  education.
lenders.occupational_info: We are third grade students in Teacher Matt's class at Thousand Oaks School in Berkeley

lenders.name: Jim, Laura & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: We recognize that we live a privileged life in a wealthy country, and that helping others is as simple as just getting involved.
lenders.occupational_info: Jim - Business owner, Laura-University instructor

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others that will work to helf themselves, and it provides a good example for my children.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lending is a good idea, and I want to be a part of it. Lending can be about helping people instead of a way to make money off of poorer people who can't afford high interest rates.
lenders.occupational_info:
Used to work for a State Highway Department.  
Now my wife and I are co-owners of a start-up Online Income Tax Filing Business.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know the value of having people believe in you. Kiva offers me a way to give back and help someone else accomplish their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with some of the world's top brands on all sorts of different assignments. I write websites, ads, direct mail campaigns.  I'm always learning, trying new things. I can't imagine a better job.

lenders.name: Andrew and Aimee Ng
lenders.loan_because: I'm learning that what I've been blessed with by the Lord is intended for me to use to bless others.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to celebrate Mother's Day!
lenders.occupational_info: Our mom is always helping others. She's an uber volunteer who is always ready to help sort books for the library, bake cookies, spend time with a friend in need.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by people who helped me when I needed it & I want to pass that blessing on to others.
lenders.occupational_info: We raise Limousin cattle. We mix & apply commercial fertilizer for agricultural use.

lenders.name: Maggie & Jared
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves the chance to better themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Most recently Maggie has been working for the airlines and myself with the railroad.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Human Resources for a Bakery & Cafe Company.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to dream.  In my world dreaming means wanting fame and money.  I think it is very humbling when you hear people's hopes are to have enough money to feed their families.  I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a University in the USA.

lenders.name: Collette Marthia
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful that I'm able to provide for myself, and it takes so little to help these people provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.occupational_info: management consultant to nonprofits

lenders.name: Alexander Franke
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody should have the possibility to build up his or her own existence. It's very important that we give other people the chance to make their ideas become reality and to get independent of development aid. The oppression must find an end! Financial independence is the first step to a fair world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Political Science and Public Law at the university of Heidelberg in Germany as I'm very much interested in Politics and Society,

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people that are less fortunate than I am.

lenders.name: Rashmi
lenders.loan_because: $25 for one dinner out is not as satisfying as lending it to someone who could really use it.  Plus, if I cook at home, I eat less calories =)
lenders.occupational_info: I used to help rich people get richer.  I hated my job.  Now I am applying for non-profit work.  Cross your fingers!

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: We as a family know about getting started in business. Success is a critical ingredient for growth. It matters that we help others get started.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family owns a real estate company, and I work with many charities to help them raise money for their programs.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the power to improve her life.

lenders.name: no-name
lenders.loan_because: I know how important the capital is in the business world.

lenders.name: Toby
lenders.loan_because: Even if it is just a little contribution, the more and more people become aware and decide to go with us this step we can really change something!

lenders.name: Pilcher
lenders.loan_because: It's the only right thing to do.  We're all riding this planet together.  If we don't take care of each other, who will?

lenders.name: wychwood
lenders.loan_because: it's really the least I can do.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I believe in investing in people's passions and in their ability to provide much needed goods and services within their own communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I conserve and restore wildlife habitat for a Native American community in the State of Washington.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: It seems an easy  and effective way to help people  on an individual basis.

lenders.name: Marc & Hilary
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of Kiva...more fortunate people helping real people realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Santa Barbara Family
lenders.loan_because: We have enough and more than most people in the world. So we want other kids and families to have a chance in getting at least pieces of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise big computer businesses what to do and how to make money; my husband helps to sell advice so people don't get in trouble - and the kids just enjoy their worry-free life.

lenders.name: miss.lee
lenders.loan_because: I was touched and moved by someone I love showing his support to others. I want to feel connected to residents of other countries through a meaningful enterpreneurial spirit such as kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher. I have a license to teach students from 6 to 11 years old. I also help students with their school works especially those that just immigrated to USA using my Chinese/English bilingual skill.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: people need help getting started and because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I found out about this website from a magazine and I am so glad it exists.  I can't imagine why anyone I know wouldn't want to give a kiva loan.

lenders.name: Maurice
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be able to provide for the needs of their family through their own successes.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business which Importers and wholesales computer parts and accessories.

lenders.name: The Pulkowski from PA
lenders.loan_because: I can...others don't have what I have been blessed with and Jesus says to 1) love God with all your heart....and 2) love your neighbors as yourself.  On Kiva...I see a lot of neighbors that need help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a systems director at a very large law firm.  Very good place to work...challenging, rewarding, great people.  Very blessed.

lenders.name: Kristina & Dan
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the dignity and potential of each person.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said that the two greatest commandments are to '... love the Lord your God with all your heart, and with all your soul, and with all your mind, and with all your strength and to love your neighbor as yourself.'
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a group of computer software programmers.  We write software for a large U.S. bank.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of something bigger than my own little world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher to brand new military officers.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: lending a helping hand during times of need fosters an environment for better international understanding
lenders.occupational_info: I teach language, primarily English as a Second Language (ESL), do Spanish translation and play classical guitar.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a chance...first, second, and next, but never a final one.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine business needs for software systems.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower others just as others have empowered me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help improve access and quality of basic education in Cambodia.

lenders.name: jackson
lenders.loan_because: because it makes me feel good to help people that are trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: Joni and Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I hope more of us can become what we COULD be and not just what we must be. Matthew wants to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use tools to make creative things. Matthew fixes bicycles.

lenders.name: Nathe
lenders.loan_because: People who want to have a go, can. Its great stuff!

lenders.name: Doug & Carla
lenders.occupation: Registered Nurse, Stay at home mom
lenders.loan_because: You can feed a man, but he will be hungry tomorrow.  Teach him to fish, and he will be fed for life.  Kiva loans help people pay for those resources.
lenders.occupational_info: Doug works as a nurse in the hospital emergency department.  Carla stays home to care for their five young children.

lenders.name: Hayley & Frank
lenders.loan_because: economic prosperity is often key, in these times, for personal growth. When your basic needs have been met, it's easier to extend yourself and lend a hand to those around you. We're privileged to be a link in the chain of human and social development.
lenders.occupational_info:
Acupuncture is an ancient Chinese healing art that uses very fine needles to stimulate the body's own healing mechanism. It's safe, gentle and useful for a wide variety of health issues.

Sound engineering matches music, voices and sound effects to the picture on the screen. It makes video come to life.
